document_title: Sleep apnea syndrome: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
What disease is sleep apnea? Sleep apnea is a common sleep disorder that causes frequent pauses in breathing during sleep. Most people with sleep apnea have symptoms such as loud snoring and daytime drowsiness.
There are three main types of sleep apnea: obstructive sleep apnea (OSA), central sleep apnea (CSA), and mixed sleep apnea.
